name: James Parker
about: I think intelligence is usually sexy until it becomes irritating. After that, you're stuck.

name: Izabella Miko
about: I'm technically a vegan, but I do eat egg if it's in things.

name: Ramsey Nouah
about: I've found out that I may be more awkward than I thought I was, but then I never saw anyone because I was in my room a lot. It's fine not to speak when you're on your own and to stammer and to not have eye contact but, outside, it's frowned upon.

about: People are put into your life for seasons, for different reasons, and to teach you lessons.

name: Xabier Elorriaga
about: I have a deep fascination with human nature, with all its virtues and all its defects.
